snippet: Michael Haneke’s new film, “Amour,” winner of the Palme d’Or at Cannes, stars Jean-Louis Trintignant and Emmanuelle Riva as a loving aging couple facing infirmity.
abstract: Michael Haneke’s new film, Amour, winner of the Palme d’Or at Cannes, stars Jean-Louis Trintignant and Emmanuelle Riva as a loving aging couple facing infirmity; film is a departure for Haneke, whose films have been described as 'cinema of cruelty.'
lead_paragraph: Michael Haneke’s new film, “Amour,” winner of the Palme d’Or at Cannes, stars Jean-Louis Trintignant and Emmanuelle Riva as a loving aging couple facing infirmity.

headline.seo: Michael Haneke Directs ‘Amour,’ With Jean-Louis Trintignant
headline.main: Words of Love From a Severe Director
headline.print_headline: Words of Love From a Severe Director
